abstract: State of Montana reaches $245,000 settlement with former University of Montana quarterback Jordan Johnson for him to drop charges that university mishandled rape investigation.
lead_paragraph: The State of Montana will pay a former quarterback $245,000 to drop his claims that University of Montana officials mishandled a rape investigation against him.

headline.main: Montana and Player Settle in Rape Case

snippet: The State of Montana will pay a former quarterback $245,000 to drop his claims that University of Montana officials mishandled a rape investigation against him.
